While Google resisted threats from rivals Yahoo! and Microsoft under Eric Schmidt , Page will confront fiercer rivals, said Whit Andrews, an analyst at Gartner. Google versus Facebook is an order of magnitude more challenging, said Andrews. Competing with the social network for the attention of Web users will require new technology that differs from search, he said. Google co-founder Sergey Brin , 37, will focus on strategic projects,

appearances on the margins of the British tabloid culture. But just one month after Pop Idol premiered in 2001, the tabloid Sunday People zeroed in on Simon Cowell under the headline WOMEN FANS FALL FOR MR. NASTY. The record boss is being chased by besotted women wanting to get to know him better-despite his sarcastic comments and cutting remarks to young wannabes on the hit ITV talent show. As his public profile rose, Simon Cowell took action to manage his image. Over 40 when Pop Idol began, Simon Cowell had had a handful of semipublic romances with singers and model types.
